full_threads.body:
Hi Fransie,

Just a quick update to let you know we’ve updated the copyright in the footer from Copyright© Eptec 2021 to Copyright© Eptec 2025.

You can see the change live here: https://eptec.com.au/

If there’s anything else you’d like adjusted, just let us know—always happy to help!

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

Thanks

From: Caroline Wilson <cwilson@eptec.com.au>

Subject: RE: External Website Copyright

Hi Fransie,

Correct - all that is needed is '© + name of copyright owner + year'

Even without that statement the website will be protected - just easier to prove ownership.

Kind regards,

Caroline
